description: This slow cooked kale and leek side dish is creamy, rich and satisfying.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Seafood free,Wheat free,Kale,Egg free,Slow cooker
name: Slow Cooker Creamy Kale & Leeks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium onion, peeled and finely sliced
0.8 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large pan on medium high heat, cook the onions for 5 minutes until softened, add the leeks and kale and cook for 2-3 minutes. Tip the mix into the slow cooker.
Add the mustard, stock and 125ml of cream and cook on low for 3 hours, stirring a couple of times. Stir through the rest of the cream and nutmeg and serve.
